signals.problem_statement: The customer support team forgets to reply to emails, leading to poor customer communication.
signals.suggested_solution: A tool to flag unanswered emails and track response quality.
signals.context: 2000 active construction sites, 30 customer support staff, using Gmail for communication.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a sentiment analysis tool to identify angry customers and adjust responses accordingly.
signals.context: Managing customer relations for multiple small construction sites.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires a way to automatically tag emails by construction site to improve visibility and management.
signals.context: Handling numerous construction sites with varying issues and communication.

signals.problem_statement: The customer seeks a dashboard that summarizes issues per construction site, highlighting problems and customer sentiment.
signals.context: Quality management team needs to monitor multiple construction sites and their associated emails.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to implement a flagging tool quickly to manage email responses effectively.
signals.suggested_solution: A flagging tool to identify emails that require attention.
signals.context: Looking to implement a solution within two weeks for quality management.
